Nafisa is asking for a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy coal and wood for the winter season. She awaits your mercy and in advance, thanks you for your generosity.

loans.use: to buy coal and wood for the winter season.

loans.name: Mavzuna

texts.en:
Mavzuna lives in the country. She is married and has 3 children. Mavzuna’s husband is a kind man and he helps her with managing the business. 

Mavzuna has been busy with animal husbandry. She buys cows, feeds them and then sells them in a local market. She has worked in this field more than 6 years and has developed this business little by little. 

She also has additional income from growing vegetables and crops. She must buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for the new sowing season, so she is asking for a loan of 6,000 Somoni to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children, two of whom attend school. She is also looking after her mother.
She operates a retail shop at the market for the last three years, working seven days a week. She does not have any other source of income. 
She has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy boxes of soap, cooking oil, sugar, rice and flour. Her challenges include seasonality and electricity. Her dream is to buy a fridge to start selling soft drinks. The weekly repayment program attracted her to join MCDT.
She lives in a rented house with access to electricity but does not have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: to buy boxes of soap, cooking oil, sugar, rice and flour.

loans.name: Doreen

texts.en:
Wonderful Kiva lenders! Meet Doreen, a 30-year-old mother who is so humble, honest and a very hardworking woman on this planet Earth. Doreen is a mother of one lovely child who she really adores so much and will always do anything good so that the child never goes to bed with a hungry stomach.

Doreen hails from the Nkubu area of Kenya. Doreen never got the opportunity to advance her education and get a white-collar job, but this did not kill her dream of wanting to succeed in life. Doreen started farming and has been doing farming for the past three years. Through those years, she has gathered so much experience, and all the farming techniques are at her fingertips.

Doreen practices mixed farming on her farm, and through the profits, she has managed to take care of her family's needs and also give her child a good education because she believes that education is the only “key to success”.

Doreen is a woman who is very enterprising, and she is seeking a loan of KES 30,000 to start horticulture farming on her farm. Because of favorable weather patterns, a good road network in her village, good soil, and a ready market for horticulture products, Doreen wants to take advantage of that and reap more profits.

Juhudi Kilimo is partnering with Kiva and Kiva lenders to help aspiring women like Doreen to make their farming dreams come to reality through training and loan financing. Doreen hopes that through the loan, she will improve her living conditions. Doreen's dreams and projections are that by the end of the first year, she will not only be selling in the local market but will also be selling in international markets through exporting fruits and vegetables.

Through this, she will be able to assure her child a secure future and uninterrupted learning because she will be able to pay tuition fees on time. Doreen is not a selfish woman and will also want to impact positively on society; that is why she will employ people to work for her on her horticulture farm, hence having an impact on society.

loans.use: to start horticulture farming.

loans.name: Abdujalil

texts.ru: Абдучалил родился в древнем  городе   Истаравшан в семье дехканина. Ему 46 лет. Абдучалил женат и имеет 2х детей. Абдучалил очень трудолюбивый мужчина и заботливый отец. Он заботится о благополучии своей семьи. Они живут в доме, который построил его отец. Абдучалил занимается бизнесом. Он торгует на местном рынке. Ему помогает старший сын Шерзод. Абдучалил впервые обратился  для получение кредита. Он хочет получить кредит для оплаты учебы своего племянника который учится в университете. Заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en: Abdujalil was born in the historic town of Istaravshan into a family of a dekhan farmer. He is 46 years old. Abdujalil is married and has 2 children. Abdujalil is a very hardworking man and a caring father. He cares about his family's welfare. They live in a house that was built by his father. Abdujalil is involved in his own business. He sells at a market. His oldest son, Sherzod, helps him with the business. This is Abdujalil's first time requesting a loan. He wants to obtain this loan to pay for his nephew's university education. He is grateful in advance for the support.

loans.use: to pay for his nephew's university education

loans.name: Yahuza

texts.en:
Yahuza is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Yahuza joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Geshon, Tobi and Justine.  

Before he became a Babban Gona member, Yahuza would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cover his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Yahuza can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to a 40% higher price than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Yahuza spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to ensure his children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay school fees and buy uniforms now, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer emprendedora de 47 años de edad, madre de una hija de 8 años y vive sola con ella.

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes talleres de confecciones como operaria de máquina, razón por la cual posee experiencia y conocimientos en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; pero, ya cansada de trabajar en otros talleres y con el ánimo de pasar más tiempo con su hija, decidió emprender su propio taller de confección, para lo cual solicita el crédito que será invertido en la compra de una maquina fileteadora, recubridora e insumos de confección como tela e hilos. 

Esto le permitirá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar un buen impacto en el sector para que le genere una rentabilidad favorable y así lograr cumplir el sueño de posicionarse en el mercado. 

Con su empuje y ambición se proyecta en un futuro a mediano plazo generando empleo siempre de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar
texts.en: Mariela is an enterprising 47 year old woman and has an 8 year old daughter who lives with her. During Mariela's life she has worked in different clothing making shops as a machine operator which is how she gained experience and knowledge to run this kind of business. But, tired of working in others' shops and with the desire to spend more time with her daughter, she decided to open her own seamstress shop. She is seeking a loan to buy a serger, sewing machine, and supplies like thread and fabric. This will enable her to launch her project with which she hopes to have a good impact in this business sector and generate favorable income, thus achieving her dream of positioning herself in the market. With her drive and ambition she looks to the future to generate employment with the help of Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy a serger, sewing machine, and supplies like thread and fabric.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a married man aged 39 years, has five children all going to school and he is living in a rural setting. He deals in the agricultural business where he grows coffee, banana plants and also rears cattle along side trading them.
He works seven days a week and 12 hours per day. He acquired this loan to purchase more cows for fattening and later sell at a profit. He said that his clients are traders from his village and those from the surrounding villages.
His hope for the future is to enlarge his cattle business and be the leading supplier of cows in his villages. The challenge he faces the most is too much drought which ends up leaving grass dry and limited water for the animals. He describes himself as an honest and hardworking man.

loans.use: to purchase cows for fattening.

loans.name: Bawa

texts.en:
Bawa is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Bawa would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cover his immediate cash needs. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Bawa can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% more than the market price at harvest. 

When asked about his goals, Bawa expressed a desire to use the extra income to build a better home, and in the long run, become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing now, thereby eliminating the pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 52-year-old, married woman from a village near Jenin city. Her husband has a workshop for repairing and selling used home appliances. It has been open for three years. It is a good business and very profitable, but still needs some improvements. 

Iman requested a USD loan from Palestine for Credit & Development (FATEN). This loan will help her husband to buy more used items and repair parts to sell in his store. This will increase his income and also the family's living conditions. 

Iman appears in the photo in her husband's workshop.

loans.use: to buy more used items and repair parts to sell in her husband's store.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila was born in 1988. She is married and has 4 children. Her husband’s income is not enough for providing the family with all necessary things, so Jamila decided to start her own business and in this way earn a living. 

She plans to begin a business of buying and selling women's clothes. She took part in a course through a women's organization called ‘To Get Ahead’, and she got a certificate. 

Jamila is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy women's clothes for starting her new business. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy women's clothes for organizing a new business.

loans.name: Isam

texts.en:
Isam is a 41-year-old married man and a father of three children, living with his family in their own house in Taiz city, Yemen. The house where Isam lives is very old and needs some necessary renovation. 

Isam doesn't have enough money to renovate the house because his income is not enough to cover all the needs of the family. 

As a result, he applied for a loan of 300,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase construction supplies to renovate the house.

He hopes to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase construction supplies to renovate the house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy poultry.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children and both go to school. She operates a restaurant at the market. She serves all kinds of people in her restaurant. She has been in this business for the last six years. 

She works seven days a week, and she takes care of additional family members. She has requested a loan of 400,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy cooking oil, flour, peas, soap and beans. 

Her major challenges include transportation and seasonality. She is hoping to build a residential house and buy a plot of land. She lives in her own house where the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy flour, cooking oil, soap, beans and peas.

loans.name: Beatriz Del Socorro

texts.es:
Beatriz con 46 años de edad es casada y madre de 3 hijos. Toda su vida fue criada en el campo, donde ha realizado actividades agropecuarias la mayor parte de su vida.  

Actualmente posee cultivos de plátano y complementa con la producción de leche, de algunas vacas que son de su propiedad, tanto la cosecha de plátano, como los litros de leche que ordeña a diarios, son vendidos en el mercado de Valencia, Córdoba, así logra obtener los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. 

Beatriz es una mujer seria, responsable, comprometida con su familia y su trabajo, por ello siempre quiere seguir avanzando es busca de un futuro mejor, por esta razón solicita un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas) con el fin de continuar con el cuidado de sus cultivos y poder sacar una cosecha en óptimas condiciones; todo esto le ayudará a seguir adelante, mejorando poco a poco su nivel de vida y la de sus hijos, a los cuales les podrá ofrecer mejor educación para que tengan un futuro próspero y lleno de éxitos.
texts.en:
Beatriz, age 46, is married and has three children.  She was raised all of her life in the country, where she has engaged in farming activities for most of her life.  She currently has banana crops, and she supplements this with milk production from some cows that she has.  Her banana harvest and the liters of milk that she milks daily are sold at the market in Valencia, Cordoba.  This way she manages to get sufficient resources to bring daily sustenance to her household.

Beatriz is a serious and responsible woman who is committed to her family and her work.  Therefore, she always wants to continue making progress in the search for a better future.  It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies (compost, fertilizers, pesticides) in order to continue caring for her crops and to be able to get a harvest that is in optimal condition.  All of this will help her to get ahead.  She will be improving, little by little, her standard of living and that of her children.  She will be able to provide her children with a better education so that they will have a prosperous future that is full of successes.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like compost, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Sabohat

texts.en:
Sabohat is a careful mother of 4 children. She always tries to improve their living conditions. Sabohat’s husband died some years ago and that’s why she is the only provider for her children. 

Sabohat is a highly educated person. She works in a local school as a teacher, and has worked there for many years. She works hard to earn a living and to provide her children with better living conditions. 

Now, she is a borrower in IMON International because she must buy plastic doors and windows for her house. The doors and windows in her house are in bad condition now and she must change that. 

Sabohat is asking for a loan of 4,000 Somoni to buy plastic doors and windows. She awaits your mercy and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: To buy plastic doors and windows.

loans.name: Chaquenas Group

texts.es:
Josefa es una mujer de 48 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos de 33 y 30 años, y su negocio es la ferretería.
Ella es emprendedora, optimista, generosa, amable, feliz, de buena actitud, comprometida con su trabajo, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘plan 3000’ un área caracterizada por la multiculturalidad de sus habitantes; inmigrantes de la etnia del lugar como los ‘Ayoreos’ y mineros relocalizados de occidente, poblaron el lugar, actualmente su segunda generación se dedica al comercio y manufactura. De clima cálido, tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura ambiente aproximada entre 21-35 grados centígrados que varía durante el día y todo el año.
Josefa es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo amarrado, su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español por el comercio (al centro, usa blusa azul floreada y falda negra). Su vida la realiza con su pareja que se dedica al transporte y sus hijos que ya son independientes. Ella junto a su pareja viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento, que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. La necesidad por mejorar sus ingresos la llevaron a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de papas fritas, venta de ropa deportiva, tienda de barrio, carnicería,  venta de sándwiches, artesanía en yeso y venta de refrescos, para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de materiales de construcción, como; tintes para pintura, lija de madera, tubos de plástico, carretillas, palas, yeso, etc. “mi trabajo es un próspero negocio porque constantemente se construyen casas, edificios y los clientes realizan pedidos de nuevos y antiguos productos…” comenta. Su sueño es abrir una sucursal en un lugar céntrico y comercial, ella desea realizar una inversión en su negocio mediante la compra de material de construcción por mayor, para surtir y abastecer su negocio debido a la temporada. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 11 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Josefa solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción por mayor para surtir su negocio y abastecer a sus clientes de temporada.
texts.en:
Josefa is a 48-year-old woman. She lives with her partner and has two children who are 33 and 30 years old. Her business is a hardware shop.

She is enterprising, optimistic, generous, courteous, happy, committed to her work, responsible, and hardworking, and she has a good attitude. She runs her business in the Plan 3000 zone, an area known for its multi-cultural inhabitants; the place was populated by immigrants from the Ayoreo ethnic group and miners relocated from the west. Now their second generation works in commerce and manufacturing. The climate is warm, tropical, and humid, with an approximate ambient temperature of 21-35 degrees celsius, which varies during the day and throughout the year.

Josefa (in the center, wearing a blue flowered blouse and a black skirt) has dark skin, short stature, and long hair worn tied back. Her mother tongue is Guaraní, and she speaks Spanish for business. She shares her life with her partner, who works in transportation, and her children, who are now independent. She and her spouse live in a house that they own; it is made of brick and cement, and has potable water, electricity, and a sewer system. 

The need to improve their income led her to form a communal bank of people with business (like fried potato sales, sportswear sales, a neighborhood shop, a meat market, sandwich sales, an artisanal plaster business, and drink sales) to request a loan and expand their businesses.  

Josefa's business is the sale of construction materials like paint dyes, sandpaper, plastic tubing, wheelbarrows, shovels, plaster, etc. "My work is a prosperous business because houses and buildings are constantly being built, and the customers place orders for new and old-fashioned products," she says. Her dream is to open a location in a central, commercial area. 

She would like to make an investment in her business through the purchase of construction material at wholesale in order to stock up and supply her business for the season. This is her first lending cycle with the institution in the 11 years that she has been running her business.

These are the reasons that Josefa is requesting a loan for the purchase of construction materials at wholesale in order to stock up her business and supply her seasonal customers.

loans.use: to buy construction materials at wholesale to stock her business and supply her seasonal customers

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгул, 45 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее средне-специальное образование, много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Дети активно помогают матери. В хозяйстве Бактыгул на сегодняшний день есть: 4 коровы, 20 овец, 1 лошадь, а также на собственном земельном наделе мерою 2,26 ГА, она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход Бактыгул составляет около 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку теленка и овец для перепродажи. Доходы от бизнеса помогут улучшить благосостояние Бактыгул и ее семьи и построить новый дом.
texts.en: Baktygul is 45 years old, married and a mother of 2 children. She has a specialized secondary education and has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for many years. The children actively help her. Today, Baktygul's farm contains 4 cows, 20 sheep, 1 horse and 2.26 hectares of land, where she grows barley. Baktygul's monthly income amounts to about 6,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy a calf and sheep for resale. The earnings from the business will help improve Baktygul's and her family's welfare and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase additional sheep and a calf for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase home appliances and sell them as a door-to-door business.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
A sus 66 años de edad Guillermo logró consolidar un negocio de sastrería gracias a la experiencia que tuvo de manera empírica, trabaja de todos los días durante 8 horas diarias dependiendo la cantidad de trabajo que tenga y sabe que gracias a sus clientes tiene buen negocio. 

Quiere ampliar sus horizontes y lograr ofrecer trabajo a las personas más necesitadas por lo que solicita un crédito para la compra de una maquina recubridora con la que podrá mejorar la presentación y calidad de sus trabajos dándole la oportunidad a una persona de trabajar.
 
Su sueño es seguir creciendo y conformar un taller, así un día contará la historia de que gracias a colaboradores y prestadores del portal Kiva y a la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar pudo montar un gran negocio.
texts.en:
Thanks to the empirical experience that he had, Guillermo, age 66, managed to consolidate a tailoring business.  He works eight hours every day, depending on the amount of work that he has.  He knows that it is thanks to his customers that he has a good business.

He wants to expand his horizons and manage to offer work to people most in need.  That is why he is requesting a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine.  With this machine he will be able to improve the look and the quality of his work, and he will be giving another person an opportunity to work.

His dream is to continue growing and to put together a shop.  This way he will one day tell the story of how, thanks to the Kiva lenders and collaborators and the help from the Corporación Interactuar, he was able to establish a great business.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Fadia

texts.en:
Fadia is a 44-year-old married mother of one child, who has been working hard to develop her family's living, especially for supporting her husband who had to fly abroad seeking a better income business.

Fadia has worked on selling clothes since 2008, and is working hard on developing it in a well managed way. Today, Fadia is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, in order to increase her business merchandise with a special winter collection, especially for the coming Christmas and New Year occasions.

She hopes that in the future she can develop her business more and open a complete shop that can attract more customers.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with a special winter collection, especially for the coming Christmas and New Year occasions.

loans.name: Yanibe Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Yanibe tiene gran experiencia en el área de panadería, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia panadería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.

Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm, aprendió del negocio a través de su suegra.

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para realizar la compra de una batidora industrial.

El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones.

Una de sus principales dificultades el alto costo de los insumos para trabajar.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran panadería que surta diferentes tiendas.

Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada y con mejores instrumentos.

Con tu aporte Yanibe Podrá progresar en su negocio!
texts.en:
Yanibe has a lot of experience in the bakery business. Some time ago she started her own bakery and today it is generated very good results. She has always preferred to work independently. She works every day from 8 AM until 9 PM. She learned the business from her mother-in-law. Today she needs help to make the purchase of an industrial mixer. The loan will enable her to work under better conditions and be able to guarantee the quality of her products. One of her main difficulties is the cost of supplies to work.

Her primary dream is to be able to have a bakery that supplies different stores. With this help she will be able to work in a more organized way and with better instruments.

With your support Yanibe will be able to grow her business!

loans.use: to buy an industrial mixer

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es:
María, utilizo el préstamo anterior para comprar insumos para elaborar la venta de tamales de elote, tostadas, atoles y otros antojitos, su negocio ha ganado popularidad, su familia se mantiene y está percibiendo mejores ganancias.
Está solicitando más capital para comprar elotes, azúcar, leña, yuca, etc., para mantener la continuidad de su negocio, María ha adquirido experiencia en el uso de préstamos y obtiene mejores beneficios para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
María used the previous loan to buy supplies for the preparation of maize tamales, tostadas, atole and other foods. Her business has gained in popularity, her family goes on, and she is receiving a better income.

She is requesting more capital to buy maize, sugar, firewood, cassava, etc. to maintain the continuity of her business. María has acquired experience in the use of loans and she obtains better benefits for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy maize, sugar, firewood, cassava, etc. to maintain the continuity of her business

loans.name: Itidal

texts.en:
Itidal is a 32-year-old single lady who has been working as a hairdresser since 2010 and her business is going along just fine. Itidal is a hard worker and well known in her region with her special talents in her domain.

She is planning to open a new branch, but unfortunately currently she doesn't have enough capital to do this step alone. That's why she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to open a new beauty salon branch in a nearby region to attract new customers and increase her income. The loan will be invested in making the necessary decoration.

She hopes that in the future, she can keep on expanding her domain in a well-managed way and continue adding new branches.

loans.use: To open a new beauty salon branch in a nearby region to attract new customers and increase her income

loans.name: Gulomjon

texts.ru: Гуломчон  родился и живет в кишлаке  Ниджани  города Истаравшан  Согдийской области в семье рабочего . Ему 30 дет. Он женат и имеет троих  детей. Он занимается дехканством. Он имеет в дехканском хозяйстве «Бердикул» 2,0 гектар земли, из них 0,5 гектар винограда, 1,5 гектара для выращивания овощей и корма для скотов. В  настоящие время он имеет одну корову.  Дополнительный доход  он получает работая мастером и занимаясь животноводством . В данным момент он хочет получить кредит для выращивания пшеницы. Он заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Gulomjon was born into a worker's family and lives in the Nidjani settlement in the town of Istaravshan of the Sughd province. He is 30 years old. He is married and has three children. He is involved in dekhan farming. In the "Berdikul" dekhan farm, he has 2.0 hectares of land, where he grows grapes on 0.5 hectares and vegetables and livestock feed on 1.5 hectares. At the present time, he has one cow. He earns an additional income from working as a contractor and being involved in animal husbandry. Currently, he wants to obtain a loan to grow wheat. He thanks MDO Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy seeds in order to plant wheat

loans.name: Fakhong Group

texts.en: Tor is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. The silver nitrate-infused ceramic element removes and destroys bacteria and similar agents of water borne diseases. Tor's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from natural sources in his village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  Even though some people in the village, including Tor, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Tor and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. Tor's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; increasing time available for productive work and improving the family’s income and over all well-being.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nelsy Maria

texts.es:
Nelsy, de 29 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas cerca a su casa ubicada en el municipio de Medellín, en este negocio vende pasteles de pollo, empanadas, buñuelos, entre otros.

Nelsy trabaja todos los días durante 5 horas, es una mujer muy responsable, juiciosa y aplicada con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.

Ella pide un aliento económico para comprar un carrito de comidas nuevo y así poder ofrecer empleo a otra persona que lo necesite.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño de ser más competitivo en el mercado y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus dos hijos.

Mejora la vida de esta colombiana con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Nelsy, 29 years old, has opted to establish a prepared food business close to her house in the Medellín municipality. In this business she sells chicken pies, empanadas and buñuelos, among others.

Nelsy works every day for 5 hours. She is a very respectable woman, with good judgement and focused on her work.

Among her most recurring dreams is to be able to have a restaurant in which she can offer different types of food and to provide jobs. She is facing multiple difficulties, such as the cost of the supplies, the competition in the area and the heavy rains that fall on her workplace.

She is requesting an economic support to buy a new food cart, and so to be able to offer employment to another person that needs it.

The loan will impact her life and her business in a very favourable way, as she will be able to fulfil her dream of being more competitive in the market. She will have a greater variety of foods to offer her customers. Her children depend on this business as well.

Improve the life of this Colombian with a loan!

loans.use: to buy a new food cart

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with three children, all of whom attend school. She is not looking after any other members of her family. She has operated a restaurant in the market on a retail basis for the last two years, working seven days a week. She does not have any other source of income.

She has requested a loan of Ugandan Shillings 200,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more green bananas, cooking oil, beans, charcoal, and vegetables.

Her challenges include seasonality and transportation. Her dream is to get better cooking and serving utensils. She joined MCDT because of the relatively low interest charged on loans.

She rents a house with access to electricity and does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy more green bananas, cooking oil, charcoal, and beans.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom go to school. She has no additional family members. 

Margret sells soft drinks at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last eight years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of UGX 200,000 (Ugandan shillings) from Micro Credit for Development and Transformation SACCO (MCDT SACCO) to buy crates of soda, passion fruits, pineapples, and pawwaws (fruits) for making juice. 

Her major business challenges include electricity and the perishability of her products. Her goal and aspiration is to buy better serving utensils and generate more capital to buy other soft drinks. She would also like to buy a plot of land. 

Margret lives in a rented house where the family has access to electricity, but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: to buy a crates of soda, passion fruits, oranges, and pawpaws.

loans.name: Napho Group

texts.en: Banya's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from natural sources in Banya's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Banya is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Even though some people in the village, including Banya, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Banya and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal or wood and decrease the time spent foraging for firewood. Banya's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to continue with his business selling pigs and firewood.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра женщина 33 лет. Она  родилась в семье дехканина. Она замужем и  имеет 3х детей. У Гулчехры очень дружная и счастливая семья. Они стараются  воспитать своих детей хорошими людьми. Муж  Гулчехры  Сухроб. Он по профессии плотник. В среднем он получает 1200 сомони в месяц. Гулчерха занимается животноводством и дехканством. В свободное время ей помогает её муж. Она хочет получить кредит для расширения животноводства.    Заранее она благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Gulchehra is 33 years old and was born in a farmers' family.  She is married and the mother of three children.  She has a very friendly and happy family.  She and her husband are trying hard to raise their children to become good people.  Her husband's name is Sukhrob.  He is a professional carpenter and he makes an average of 1,200 somoni per month.  Gulchehra is involved in animal husbandry and farming.  Her husband helps her in his spare time.  Gulchehra wants to receive a loan to expand her animal husbandry business.  She thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support and their trust.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Bor Group

texts.en: Bounma is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. The silver nitrate-infused ceramic element removes and destroys bacteria and similar agents of waterborne diseases. Bounma's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from natural sources in his village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. Even though some people in the village, including Bounma, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Bounma and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. Bounma's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter. Increasing time available for productive work also improves a family’s income and over all well-being.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es: Catalina de 57 años de edad es una mujer valiente y trabajadora que habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 7 nietos por lo que se siente muy feliz de poder contar con este beneficio de un lugar donde vivir. Ella se gana la vida vendiendo los huevos que obtiene de las gallinas que cría apoyada por su compañero de vida que se desempeña como jornalero, pero que también cultiva granos básicos y el maicillo que les da a los animales. Catalina desea comprar una batería para el sistema de energía con paneles solares, ya que no tiene energía eléctrica y desea tener este servicio por medio de la energía solar, y es para ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: una batería y el sistema de energía solar de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Catalina is 57 years old. She is a brave and hard-working woman who lives in her own house with her partner and their 7 grandchildren, which is why she is very happy that she has a place to live. She makes a living selling eggs that she gets from the hens that she raises with support from her partner, who works as a day laborer and also grows basic grains and ground feed that they feed to the animals. 

Catalina wants to buy a battery for a system of solar panels, since she doesn’t have electricity and wants to get energy from the solar panels. It is for this that she requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in a battery and a system of solar panels for her house.

loans.use: to invest in a battery and a system of solar panels for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in sheet-metal gutters, wood, nails, wire, and galvanized metal sheets to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more construction materials to sell and to be able to attract a lot of customers.

loans.name: Dongnork Group

texts.en: Thong's village takes water from wells and from the local streams. Some people in the village, including Thong, are able to buy bottled water. The water from natural sources in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Thong is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other waterborne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income to users like Thong due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal, by decreasing time spent foraging for wood, and decreasing  the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. The filter is guaranteed for two years, though most find the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Maher

texts.en:
Maher is a 39-year-old married father of two, a Palestinian refugee who works hard to develop his family's living, especially his children's education to make sure they can benefit from a brighter future.

Maher has worked as a car electrician since 2001, and he has very special talents in his domain. He is well known in his region and recommended by most of his clients.

Although his business is going on just fine, he still needs external financial support to cover unexpected requested needs. That's why today, Maher is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for his children's school tuition fees. He will use some of the loan to buy carpets which are necessary for his house before the coming winter season to keep his family living in a healthy living place.

He hopes that he can stay capable of providing his children with the best education. He hopes to make his dream of seeing them become important people in their society come true.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school tuition fees.

loans.name: Maria Ceney

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer con gran pasión y motivación, desde hace un tiempo se determino a encontrar una actividad que le generar buenos ingresos y que le permitiera ser independiente, es así como desde hace 3 años inicio con un negocio de bar.

Es un negocio bastante popular en el sector por la buena atención y servicio que presta Maria. Con tan poco tiempo en el mercado ya tiene cierto nivel de reconocimiento gracias a la buena gestión de Maria.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de bebidas, licores y frituras para abastecer su negocio. Trabaja sola durante viernes, sábado y Domingo que es en los días en que más clientes tiene en su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is a very passionate and motivated woman. For some time, she was determined to find an activity that earns her a good income and that allows her to be independent. Because of this, 3 years ago, she started a bar.

It is a very popular business in the area because of the good service Maria offers. With only a little time in the market, it already has a good reputation thanks to Maria’s good management.

She requests a loan to buy a supply of drinks, liquors, and fried food to supply her business. She only works on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays, which are the days on which her business has the most clients.

loans.use: to buy a supply to drinks, liquors, and fried food to supply her business.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca, vive con su madre y una hija, en edades de 94 y 16 años respectivamente; ella tiene la responsabilidad de cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar, para tener recursos económicos se dedica a fabricar jarabe de carao, horchata (en refresco y para preparar) además ofrece gano café a sus clientes en una mini tienda ubicada en su vivienda. Su negocio funciona desde hace 15 años y lo heredo de su madre.
Invertirá en azúcar, carao, vainilla, leña, gano café, canela, gas propano y otros ingredientes para elaborar  los refrescos y ofrecer producto de calidad a sus clientes, espera mejorar la productividad y sus ingresos, que le sarán de ayuda para resarcir su deuda y cambiar su estilo de vida familiar.
Sus aspiraciones son tener un negocio más amplio y lograr trabajar con capital propio.
texts.en: Blanca lives with her mother and a daughter, who are 94 and 16 years old respectively. She has the responsibility to cover the basic needs of her household. In order to have financial resources, she works producing carao syrup, "horchata" (as a drink and to be prepared), and also she offers "gano coffee" to her customers in a mini store located in her house. She has had this business for 15 years; she inherited it from her mother. She will buy sugar, carao, vanilla, log, gano coffee, cinnamon, propane gas and other ingredients to produce soft drinks and offer a quality product to her customers. She hopes to improve productivity and her income, which will be beneficial to cover her debt and change her lifestyle. Her dreams are to have a larger business and to work with her own capital.

loans.use: to buy sugar, carao, vanilla, log, "gano coffee", propane gas and other ingredients to produce soft drinks and to offer a quality product to her customers.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel es un hombre  casado que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 3 nietos, ya que su hija presta sus servicios domésticos en la capital. Él es un hombre que se esfuerza cada día en su trabajo de agricultor, ya que desde hace 6 años se gana la vida cultivando la tierra y en la crianza de animales de corral, con lo que ha logrado mantener la estabilidad económica de su hogar. Daniel desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI que le permita realizar una inversión en: lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera para cambiar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en: Daniel is a married man who lives in his own home with his wife and 3 grandchildren, as his daughter works as a domestic employee in the capital. He is a man who strives every day in his work as a farmer. He has been farming for 6 years, cultivating the land and raising farm animals. With this he has been able to support his home economically. Daniel wishes to acquire a loan from FUSAI that will enable him to invest in galvanized laminate, nails, and wood to change the roof of his home.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized laminate, nails, and wood to change the roof of his home.

loans.name: Tumaini Riz Group

texts.fr: Une fois adulte, les parents de Godefroid lui ont donné un champ dont les revenus lui permettent de répondre aux  besoins familiaux. Le problème se pose au niveau du coût de la main d'oeuvre , le transport de la récolte jusqu à la route ainsi que les clients qui veulent fixer eux-mêmes le prix. Il souhaite prochainement acheter un vehicule pour assurer le transport de sa récolte et améliorer la vie de sa famille. Il préside le groupe TUMAINI et porte sur la photo un boubou vert.
texts.en: When he became an adult, Godefroid's parents gave him a field whose income allows him to meet his family's needs. He needs help with labor costs, transporting his harvest, and clients who want to set their own prices. He would like to buy a vehicle soon so that he can transport his harvest and improve the life of his family. He supervises the Tumaini group and is wearing a green tunic.

loans.use: to rent land and pay for plowing, harrowing, fertilizer, and seeds.

loans.name: Hugo Hernan

texts.es:
Hugo es un hombre muy trabajador y organizado, se gana la vida prestando el servicio de mensajería en su motocicleta a través de las calles del municipio de Medellín posibilitando el desplazamiento del correo y encomiendas de la comunidad hasta las distintitas áreas del municipio.

Es un hombre amable, servicial y muy emprendedor, es casado y padre de dos hijos menores a los cuales siempre ha procurado ofrecerles la mejor vida posible.

Solicita un préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento y reparación a su moto ya que es su único medio de trabajo y con la que ha enfrentado en muchas ocasiones las fuertes lluvias y la inseguridad del sector.

Con este crédito podrá mejorar las condiciones de su vehículo y podrá continuar prestando su servicio con total seguridad y sin poner en riesgo su vida. 

Apoya a Hugo con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Hugo is a very hard-working and organized man who earns a living working as a messenger. He uses his motorcycle through the Medellin city streets distributing mail and packages from one area of the city to another. He is a friendly, enterprising, and helpful man. He is married and is the father of two small children for whom he has always worked to provide them the best life possible.

He seeks a loan to do maintenance and repairs on his motorcycle as it is his own mode of transportation for work. He has endured strong rain many times and dangerous areas of the city.
With this loan he will be able to improve his motorcycle's condition and be able to provide service with total safety and without putting his life at risk.

Support Hugo with a loan today!

loans.use: to do maintenance and repairs on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 19 year old, single man from Deir El balah. One year ago, Hasan bought a rickshaw and started using it to transfer goods to the local market. He also buys products from wholesalers and resells them in the market with a profit margin.

Hasan took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products from wholesalers to resell it to local traders. By taking this loan, Hasan will be able to improve his business and increase his income.

Hasan appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy more products from wholesalers to resell to local traders.

loans.name: Jose Eligio

texts.es: José es un hombre que se destaca por la tenacidad que muestra en su trabajo, y habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 4 hijos tres varones y una niña. Él sabe que el gasto en su vivienda, es mucho por lo extenso pero eso no lo detiene y desde hace muchos años se gana la vida cultivando la tierra con granos básicos, que almacena para su consumo y el de su familia, además se desempeña como jornalero en una finca cercana. En la vivienda de José la energía  depende del sol ya que la obtienen a base de paneles solares, por lo que necesita todo un sistema y una batería para que funcione, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: una batería y la revisión del sistema de energía solar.
texts.en: José is a man known for the tenacity he demonstrates in his work. He lives in his own home with his wife and 4 children (3 sons and 1 daughter). He knows that the expenses of his home are many but that doesn't stop him and for many years he has earned a living farming by growing basic grains that he stores for his family's consumption. In addition he works as a day laborer in a nearby farm. Jose's home depends on the sun for its solar energy system, and it has a set of solar panels. He needs a system and a battery so that they function, so he seeks a loan from FUSAI to to invest in a batter and update for the solar energy system.

loans.use: to invest in a batter and update for the solar energy system.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es: Ismael de 53 años de edad es un hombre casado que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 6 hijos 4 varones y 2 niñas, además tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad que habitan en la capital pero le apoyan económicamente. Él es un hombre que desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra por lo que gracias a su experiencia ha logrado salir adelante apoyado de la agricultura. Ismael desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI que le permita realizar una inversión en la batería del sistema solar de energía , ya que el sistema de energía de Ismael es solar por lo que necesita la batería para que trabaje adecuadamente, es por ello que espera recibir este apoyo lo antes posible para poder tener su sistema solar de energía en buen estado y disfrutar del servicio.
texts.en:
Ismael is 53 years old, and he is a married man who lives in his own house with his wife and their 6 children, including 4 boys and 2 girls. He also has 2 older children who live in the capital, but Ismael supports them financially. He is a man who—from a young age—learned to work the land, and thanks to his experience, he has succeeded in going forward through agriculture. 

Ismael wants to get a loan from FUSAI that will allow him to invest in a battery for a system of solar panels, since Ismael has a solar panel energy system that requires a battery for it to work properly. It is for this that he hopes to receive this financial support so that he can ensure his solar panel system is in good repair and so that he can enjoy its service.

loans.use: to invest in a battery for his solar panel energy system.

loans.name: Jose Osman

texts.es: José es un hombre de 48 años de edad y que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 7 hijos. Él es un hombre emprendedor que pone todo su esfuerzo en su trabajo como técnico viverista en una empresa dedicada al cuido del habitad, además junto a su grupo familiar, cultivan granos básicos que almacenan para su consumo en época de poca cosecha. José no cuenta con energía eléctrica, ya que la energía que utiliza en su vivienda proviene de paneles solares, aunque estos están en malas condiciones, por lo que él solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: una batería y la revisión y reparación del sistema de paneles solares de su vivienda, esperando poder contar con este apoyo lo antes posible para realizar dicha revisión y reparación.
texts.en: José is a 48-year-old man who lives in his own home with his wife and their seven children. He is a hard-working man who puts all of his efforts into working as a farm technician in a company that works to take care of the environment. Also, he grows basic crops with his family which they store to eat during the off-season. José doesn't have electricity and the energy he uses in his home comes from solar panels even though they are in bad shape. This is why he's asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in a battery and the review and repair of his solar panel system in his home. He is hoping to receive this support as soon as possible so he can complete these repairs.

loans.use: to invest in: a battery and the review and repair of the solar panel system in his house.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: Flor es una mujer de 32 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 14, 12 y 7 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que buscando la manera de apoyar con los gastos de su vivienda decidió dedicarse a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, actividad que realiza desde hace 5 años. Flor desea construir un muro perimetral que le permita darle mayor seguridad a su vivienda, ya que actualmente su vivienda está protegida por lámina que además puede ser un peligro para sus hijos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un muro perimetral en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Flor is a 32-year-old woman, who lives in her own house with her husband and their 3 children, who are 14, 12, and 7 years old. She is an enterprising woman who, looking for a way to help with the household expenses, decided to sell beauty products by catalog. She has been doing this for 5 years. 

Flor wants to build a surrounding wall that will allow her to offer more security to her house. At present, her house is protected by metal sheets, which can be a danger for her children. 

For this reason, she requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and iron to build a surrounding wall around her house.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and iron to build a surrounding wall around her house.

loans.name: Maria Orbelina

texts.es:
María, comercializa semilla de marañón, el oficio de procesar este producto lo aprendió dentro de su familia, en la actualidad es su fuente de ingresos para subsistir con su familia, tiene un horario de siete de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, sus ventajas es que tiene clientes que le compran al por mayor y su dificultad es cuando llega la temporada de escases de la materia prima. María vive con su esposo y sus hijos, no tiene familiares en el extranjero.
El financiamiento le permitirá poder comprar semilla de marañón por mayoreo a un precio accesible antes que finalice la temporada de buenas ventas, espera que su situación financiera tanga un cambio positivo.
Sus sueños son cancelar sus deudas y comprar un vehículo para entregar los pedidos con rapidez y también tener un medio de transporte para salir a recrearse con su familia.
texts.en: María sells cashew nuts. She learned this work through her family. Today it is her source of income to support her family. She works from 7 AM until 4 PM. Her advantage is that she has customers that buy at wholesale and her difficulty is when the high season arrives and there is little product. Maria lives with her husband and children, she doesn't have any family living abroad. The loan will enable her to buy cashew nuts at a low wholesale price before the low season of good sale prices ends. She hopes that her financial situation will be a positive change. Her dreams are to pay her debts and buy a vehicle with which she can make deliveries rapidly and also have a means of transportation for her family.

loans.use: to buy cashew nuts at a low wholesale price before the low season of good sale prices ends.

loans.name: Dollycinta

texts.en:
Dollycinta is a 20 year old lady pursuing a course in business and information technology. She aims to join the most rapidly developing fields in the professional in the world. The knowledge she acquired throughout her studies will be used to make a difference in people's lives by making their lives easier through technology entrepreneurship and business.

For this reason, Kiva offering a hand of support, she will be able to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: To pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Liney Judith

texts.es:
Liney es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a su hijo brindándole una educación de buena calidad.

Liney vive en unión libre con su pareja y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a través de catalogo de marcas reconocidas, con gran esfuerzo ha superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Liney tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital, que entre otras cosas es una de sus más grandes dificultades, busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal al por mayor y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.

Anímate a prestar al negocio de Liney!
texts.en:
Liney is a very hard-working person, who thanks to her daily effort has succeeded in going forward to offer her son a good education.

Liney is in a common-law married with her partner. A long time ago, she started to sell personal use products from recognized brands through a catalog. With a lot of effort, she has overcome many problems that she has faced.

Now, Liney has some very good orders on behalf of her clients. Because she doesn’t have a lot of capital—which among other things is one of her biggest hurdles—she is looking for a loan to buy personal use products wholesale, so that she can fulfill the big orders she has from her clients.

Her biggest dream is to go forward with her business and to offer her son a good quality of life and financial stability. She knows that with the help of Interactuar, she will be able to succeed in achieving these dreams.

You should lend to Liney’s business!

loans.use: to buy personal use products wholesale.

loans.name: Nisrine

texts.en:
Nisrine is a 32-year-old single woman who puts much effort in developing herself, especially through establishing her own grocery store in November 2013, where she also runs her favorite hobby as a hairdresser.

Nisrine choose to open her grocery store because she was thinking of a business with a daily income. But her passion for hairdressing didn't stop, so her first step toward achieving her goals is to start her hairdressing service inside her grocery store, and it is turning out to be successful.

Nisrine is acquiring her first loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with special-offer products, in addition to buying special curtains for her house to keep warm during the coming winter season.

She hopes that in the future her business income will be good enough so that she can establish a separate beauty salon and make her dream come true.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with special-offer products, in addition to buying special curtains for her house to keep warm during the coming winter season

loans.name: Silvia Rosa

texts.es:
Ella es Silvia, una mujer de carácter y buena voluntad, con deseos de progresar y salir adelante con su familia.
Ella decidió por iniciar con un negocio de preparación y venta de galletas desde hace aproximadamente 15 años en su casa.

Este oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica, con la necesidad y el gusto por la gastronomía, esto le permitió obtener gran experiencia.

Hoy en día desea darle un pequeño impulso a su negocio con la ayuda de los prestadores de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar, por esta razón requiere un préstamo para realizar unas adecuaciones a su cocina para trabajar de una forma más cómoda y amplia.

Con este crédito podrá sostener su negocio y hacerlo crecer cada día más.
Es una mujer que asume retos y los enfrenta con valentía.

Si prestas a este préstamo estarás aportando al progreso y empuje Colombiano!
texts.en:
This is Silvia, who is a woman of character and good intentions and who has goals of progressing and going forward with her family.

She decided to start a business preparing and selling cookies from her house about 15 years ago. 

She learned this work through trial and error, based on the need and her enjoyment for cooking. This allowed her to have a good experience.

Now, she wants to give a boost to her business with the help of Kiva lenders and Interactuar. For this reason, she needs a loan to make some changes to her kitchen so that she can work more comfortably and on a larger scale.

With this loan, she will be able to sustain her business and have it grow more. 

This is a woman who takes on challenges and faces them bravely.

If you grant this loan, you will be supporting Colombian progress and drive!

loans.use: to make some changes to her kitchen to work more comfortably and on a larger scale.

loans.name: Mirian Concepcion

texts.es: Mirian es una mujer trabajadora que cuenta con  49 años de edad y habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y su hija, por lo que se siente feliz de poder brindarle un lugar donde vivir a su familia. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida prestando sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar desde 5 años. Mirian desea encementar el piso de su vivienda, ya que este por ser de tierra provoca insalubridad y enfermedades respiratorias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de su vivienda lo antes posible y así evitar que su familia contraiga una enfermedad respiratoria.
texts.en:
Mirian is a hard-working woman, who is 49 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their daughter. She is happy to be able to offer her family a place to live. She is a hard-working woman that has made a living offering household services for 5 years.

Mirian wants to cement the floor of her house, since it is currently made of dirt, which causes unhealthiness and respiratory illnesses. For this, she requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, and gravel to cement the floor of her house. This will ensure that her family avoids contracting respiratory illnesses.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, and gravel to cement the floor of her house.

loans.name: Inomjon

texts.en:
Inomjon was born in 1984. He lives in the country. Inomjon is married and has two children. He is the main earner of his family. 

Inomjon began his animal husbandy business 10 years ago. He feeds cows and horses. He has a big farm. Inomjon’s working day usually begins in the early morning. He works hard, and his wife helps him with feeding the cows and horses. 

Inomjon must buy coal and wood for the winter season because the weather is cold and he must provide good living conditions for his children. Inomjon is asking for a loan of 2500 somoni to buy coal and wood. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy coal and wood for the winter season

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel is a maize farmer. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Daniel would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to meet his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Daniel can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% more than the market price at harvest. Like other Babban Gona members, Daniel is looking  to earn a better income to provide more food and clothing for his family, and hopes to make more money for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ruth Noemi

texts.es: Ruth es una mujer de 33 años de edad que se gana la vida con la crianza y venta de pollo, además elabora tamales de gallina obteniendo mejores ingresos. Ruth habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Ruth sabe que con sus negocios ha logrado mantener la estabilidad económica de su vivienda, por lo que ha tomado decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pollos, tomates, maíz, especies, etc. Para seguir con su negocio de crianza de pollos y elaboración de tamales.
texts.en: Ruth is a 33 year old woman who earns a living raising and selling chickens. In addition, she makes chicken tamales to generate more income. Ruth lives in her own home with her husband and 4 year old son. Ruth knows that with her business she has been able to support her home, so she has made the decision to ask FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying chickens, tomatoes, corn, spices, etc. in order to continue with her business raising chickens and making tamales.

loans.use: to invest in buying chickens, tomatoes, corn, spices, etc.

loans.name: Wissam

texts.en: Wissam is a 36-year-old married father of five children, and a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. Five years ago, he opened a small cafe shop inside the camp in an attempt to cover the expenses and needs of his family. Wissam gained experience in this domain from his brother. He is a hard worker and ambitious man who is trying desperately to develop his business in order to provide his family with a better life, but he is impeded by the low social and financial situations of people living inside the camp. Thus, he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to renovate his house, to make it a healthier place for his family.

loans.use: to renovate his house

loans.name: Windrose

texts.en:
Hello, world! Meet Windrose; as her name suggests, she is a “Rose.” She lives in the Litein area of Kenya, renowned for producing long-distance elite runners who have broken world records in the Olympics. Windrose is a mother, and she has been in the agricultural business for 10 years. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, and vegetables. Windrose has been relying on agriculture to make all her income. However, rising prices of farming inputs, such as fertilizers, and fluctuations in the market prices of farm products are some of the serious challenges that are cutting farmers' profits significantly. Despite these tough conditions, Windrose remains positive and passionate about her economic activity.

Windrose is seeking a loan to purchase poultry. This will enable her to expand the section of her business least affected by harsh external conditions. A poultry farm is cheaper to run, and the demand for chicken products is always high. With this loan, Windrose will be able to increase the sales from her poultry business and make more profit. An increase in income for her is timely, since it will enable her to tackle high farm-related costs next season. This will greatly improve the quality of her work, since the cost of every input will be met adequately. As a result, she will realize better-quality produce and higher yields. This loan will support Windrose’s economic activity, and will change her family’s living standard indirectly.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Flor Edy

texts.es:
Flor es una mujer muy emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y progresar.
Desde hace 4 años se viene dedicando a la venta de productos por catalogo como ropa, accesorios, artículos de belleza y elementos para el hogar, estos productos los vende principalmente a amigos, vecinos y familiares que conocen a Flor y quieren que también progrese en su actividad.
Desde muy niña sintió gran afinidad con el comercio y las ventas, por lo que hoy en día tiene grandes habilidades en este campo gracias a su simpatía y excelente calidad de servicio.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de productos de belleza y ropa para aumentar su inventario y mejorar sus ventas, obteniendo así unos buenos ingresos para su hogar
Tiene la esperanza de poder salir adelante gracias al apoyo de las personas de buen corazón que apoyan este tipo de proyectos y al acompañamiento de la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Flor is a very enterprising woman who really wants to get ahead and progress. For 4 years she has been selling products by catalog, such as clothing, accessories, beauty items and items for the home. She sells these products mainly to friends, neighbors and relatives who know Flor and who also want her to progress in her activity.  

Since she was very young she has felt a strong affinity for commerce and sales. That is why today she has a lot of abilities in this field, thanks to her kindness and quality of service. She is asking for a loan to buy a selection of beauty products and clothing to increase her inventory and improve her sales, thus obtaining good income for her home. 

She hopes to get ahead thanks to the support of the good hearted people who support this type of products and to the backing of Corporación Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy a selection of beauty products and clothes.

loans.name: Lucelly

texts.es:
Lucelly, a sus 26 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos, a los que ha sacado adelante con arduo esfuerzo y dedicación. 
Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado como comerciante independiente en su propio almacén de repuestos y ferretería; allí trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas y ha logrado generar los ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares.
Expresa que su interés con el crédito es invertir en la compra de surtido al por mayor como repuestos para guadañas, sierras y herramientas, entre otros para abastecerse lo suficiente y poder satisfacer los gustos de su clientela con la variedad que ofrecerá; esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas  y los ingresos que recibe, además le hará frente a su mayor desafío que es sostenerse frente a la competencia desleal que se presenta en el sector. 
Lucelly manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y pagar la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: Lucelly is 26 years old, a mother to two children, who has been successful through her hard work and dedication. She has worked as an independent businesswoman in her own parts and hardware store. She works there every day for 10 hours and has been able to generate income to meet her family's needs. She states that her interest in the loan is to buy stock at wholesale such as parts for scythes, saws, and tools among other items to stock up and be able to satisfy her customers' needs with the variety that she will offer. This will help her increase her sales and income that she receives. In addition she will be able to distinguish herself from the competition in this sector. Lucelly shares that her main goal is to improve her home's condition and pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stock at wholesale such as parts for scythes, saws, and tools among other items.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Sophia, 30 years of age, a very hardworking, honest, and dedicated farmer. She lives in Magumango, a remote village in Chuka. She is happily married and has been blessed with three, adorable children. She has been practicing mixed farming for the last five years, and she has gained so much experience. To afford a decent and comfortable life for her children, she has been selling milk, eggs, and a variety of food crops, from her farmland. To make ends meet and make extra cash, she has been engaging in another small, personal business.

The Chuka area is densely populated, and demand for poultry products and eggs is very high. Like many farmers from her region, Sophia finds poultry farming very enjoyable, and she stated that the most enjoyable part about poultry farming is “the increased profits I enjoy.” Her biggest challenge, however, is meeting the demand that is really high. She lacks funds to increase her poultry farming, and she is seeking a loan of 30,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) to buy poultry. Being a woman accessing funds is very challenging. With institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo (partnering with Kiva), she feels relieved, knowing that her dream will be achieved, and she will be able to buy more poultry. Through the loan, she will sell more eggs and poultry products to her neighbors and to the local market. This will translate to an increased profit margin and an improved income level.

Being a visionary woman, she intends to accumulate more profits and increase her poultry offerings to other markets. This will increase her income and improve her living conditions. The extra income she will get will be used to fully repay the loan, permanently change her living conditions, and secure the future of her school-going children.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell to her customers, like women's clothes, perfumes, incense, and other goods.

loans.name: Luis Evelio

texts.es:
Luis, con 25 años de edad, es un hombre soltero. 

Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agrícolas al lado de su padre; gracias a ello, hoy en día tiene cultivos de café, cuya cosecha es vendida y de esta manera obtiene los recursos para llevar el alimento a su hogar. 

El prestatario es un hombre pujante, luchador, dedicado a su familia y a su trabajo, eso lo motiva para trabajar largas jornadas y tratar de salir adelante; día a día lucha para sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan, ha pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles debido al bajo precio del café en el mercado, lo que afecta el precio de su producto. 

Luis solicita su crédito en la Corporación Interactuar para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas), con el fin de darle continuidad a su negocio y preparar sus cultivos para cosechar un producto de muy buena calidad.
Luis sueña con mejorar sus cultivos, ampliarlos para obtener de estos una buena renta mensual.
texts.en:
Luis is 25 years old and single. He was born and raised in the country, where he learned agricultural work at his father's side. Thanks to that, today he has coffee crops. He sells the harvest and that is how he obtains resources to support his home.  

The borrower a driven man who is a fighter. He is dedicated to his family and his work. This motivates him to work long hours to try to get ahead. He fights day to day to overcome obstacles that come up. He has gone through difficult financial situations due to the low price of coffee in the market, which affects the price of his product.  

Luis is asking for his loan from Corporación Interactuar to invest in buying agricultural materials (compost, fertilizer, and pesticide) so that he con continue  with his business and prepare his crops for harvest a very good quality product. 

Luis dreams of improving his crops and expanding them to obtain good monthly products.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as compost, fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: El Amana 2 Group

texts.en:
Wafaa is the featured borrower for El Amana 2 Group. She got along with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan, because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard, to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Wafaa is a 52-year-old, married mother of seven children. She started almost two years ago, selling cleaning products from her house. In this way, she helps her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family.

Today, Wafaa is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua. She will use her share of this loan to increase her business merchandise with more cleaning products. This will enable her to satisfy her customers' needs and improve her family's living conditions.

Wafaa is the first lady on the left, in the photo. With respect to the other group members, Liliane is the first lady on the right of the photo, and Noureya is the lady in the middle of the photo.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with more cleaning products.

loans.name: Nyakitojo  Tweyimukye Group

texts.en:
Annet, who lives in Fort Portal, Uganda, is a hardworking single lady with a responsibility of taking care of two children, both of whom go to school. She deals in a secondhand clothing business, alongside farming, to supplement her income. Annet engaged herself in these businesses in order to get income to support her children, because she is the only breadwinner. Like all loving parents, she would like to see her children attain university education as a minimum qualification. 

She encounters a difficulty of bad weather, especially the rainy season, where she does not work since she operates from an open place.  Annet will use the loan to buy secondhand clothes to sell for this festive season.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothes to sell for this festive season.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel is a married man who is 34 years old. He does not have any children, but looks after his two young sisters. He lives in a rural area with the family. He deals in cattle trading and also does agriculture as a side business. He started his business in 2006. He works 7 days a week, 14 hours per day. He  started his business to increase his family's income, and to provide a better standard of living for his family. He acquired this loan to buy more baby cows for fattening and to later sell. His clients are cattle traders from cities.

His hope for the future is to increase his stock and to have a family. The challenge he faces is cattle diseases, which lead to the death of cows, which later reduces the profits he earns. He is grateful for the services lenders offer that enable people to develop, as well as developing their communities.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Usman

texts.en: Usman is a maize farmer from Mafera village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Usman would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Usman can now store his maize at harvest time, and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Usman, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to expand his farmland, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Philippe
