texts.en: Olive is 41 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 4 and 10 years; all of them go to school.  She sells clothes and has been doing this business for 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more skirts, dresses and shirts for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more skirts, dresses and shirts for sale.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Diana es una agricultora muy habilidosa con experiencia en varias áreas de la agricultura, con un talento innato para el trabajo en equipo y una gran mente emprendedora.

Tiene un cultivo de café que atiende todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana.

Actualmente vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos por los cuales ha tratado de luchar siempre para sacarlos adelante.

Ella desea darle un impulso a su cultivo y obtener mejores ingresos de este por eso pide un auxilio económico para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como pesticidas, abonos y semillas de café, el préstamo le dará la oportunidad de tener un producto de mejor calidad.

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y brindarle a sus hijos un buen futuro!
texts.en:
Diana is a very skilled farmer with experience in diverse areas of agriculture, with an innate talent for team work and a great business mind. She has a coffee crop that she tends to everyday, beginning very early in the morning. 

Diana lives her husband and their three children, for whom she has always tried to fight to get ahead in life.

Diana wishes to boost her crop and in this way increase her earnings. For this reason, she requests economic assistance to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as pesticides, fertilizers, and coffee plant seeds. 

The loan would give Diana the opportunity to have a higher quality product. Her greatest wish is to have her own home and offer her children a good future.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as pesticides, fertilizers, and coffee plant seeds.

loans.name: Jonas Nahum

texts.es: Jonas tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de un año de edad. Jonas trabaja como jornalero desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Jonas no cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica y ha tomado la decisión de comprar una planta solar para instalar el sistema de energía en su vivienda y así poder dar mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en: Jonas is 21 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and his little one year-old child.  Jonas has been working as a day laborer for a long time.  This is how he earns a living and supports his household.  Jonas has no electricity in his home, and so he has decided to install a solar energy system for his house so that he can provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to install a solar energy system for his house

loans.name: Señor Nazareno Group

texts.es: Juan tiene 45 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos dependiente. El se dedica a la venta de pan frutas gaseosas productos lácteos aguas y confitería en un puesto  cerca al peaje de la zona que radica. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de panetones chocolates champagne por campaña navideña.  Ser parte del grupo “SEÑOR NAZARENO” le ha permitido obtener financiamiento para mejorar su negocio. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado.  Juan es el que viste polo deportivo de color turquesa con franja azul y rojo.
texts.en: Juan is 45 years old.  He lives with his partner and has 2 dependent children.  He has a business selling groceries, including bread, fruit, soft drinks, dairy products, water, and pastries, from a stall near a motorway that is located in his area.  He will invest this loan in the purchase of chocolate, panettones (Christmas sweet breads), and champagne for the Christmas selling season.  He is a member of the communal bank "Señor Nazareno," which has enabled him to obtain loans to improve his business.  This group thanks the Kiva lenders for the support provided.  In the photo, Juan is seen wearing a turquoise sports shirt with blue and red stripes.

loans.use: to buy chocolate, panettones, and champagne

loans.name: Horacio

texts.es:
Horacio es un joven campesino de 25 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de variadas frutas como mangos, naranjas, gayabas, entre otros, cultivos que atiende todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Sonsón, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos con los que vela por el bienestar de sus padres que tanto lucharon para sacarlo adelante. 

Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado en la Corporación Interactuar, comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor como abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros, con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, más productiva y asi mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos.

Horacio, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para su familia.

El cultivo de Horacio Podrá mantenerse y salir adelante con tu ayuda!
texts.en:
Horacio is a young farmer, he is 25 years old, he is hard-working and modest. As a boy, he learned to do all the work in the fields, thanks to the teachings of his parents. This has allowed him to progress, and today he owns crops of several fruits, such as mangoes, oranges, guava, among others; crops that he tends to every day. The harvests are sold at the market plaza of the municipality of Sonson. Additionally, he works as a day laborer in different farms of the region. This way, he supplements the income with which he watches over the well-being of his parents, who worked very hard to help him get ahead.

With the support of the loan from Corporación Interactuar, he will buy agricultural inputs at wholesale, such as manure, pesticides, fertilizers and others. With this, he will continue to take care of his crops and he will have a better, more productive harvest, and therefore he will improve his income when he is selling his products. 

Horacio, with his entrepreneurial spirit, his strength, and his tenacity, wants to keep working hard to achieve the dream of having his own farm, in which he can grow a wider variety of products, and improve the profitability of his business, guaranteeing economic stability for his family. 

Horacio’s crop will be able to be maintained and improve with your help!

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs at wholesale, such as manure, pesticides, fertilizers, and others.

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
José un joven de 21 años de edad que se encuentra muy motivado y emocionado ante la oportunidad que se le presenta en la vida y es que gracias a la Corporación Interactuar puede solicitar un préstamo para iniciar su propio negocio de venta de productos de uso personal, un sueño que le ha sido errado pues al ser su primera experiencia crediticia no le desembolsaban el préstamo. 

Con el crédito solicitado comprara surtido de productos de la marca Amway. 

Este crédito será de suma importancia para José pues representa el principio de una vida como independiente y una oportunidad de progresar como empresario.
texts.en:
José, a 21-year-old young man, is highly motivated and excited for the opportunity that life has given him. Thanks to the Interactuar Corporation he can request a loan to start his own business selling products of personal use, a dream that he hadn’t been able to accomplish since no one would give him a loan for being his first credit experience.

With this loan he will buy different products of the brand Amway.

This loan is of great importance to José since it means the beginning of an independent life with the opportunity of making a progress as an entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy different products of the brand Amway.

loans.name: Diana Maria

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer muy emprendedora y creativa, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de venta de artesanías en el parque del municipio de Bello.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que ella salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán su esposo y su hijo, los cuales son su más grande motivación.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar surtido de artesanías al por mayor y estanterías para montar su negocio.

Este crédito le permitirá soñar con un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Diana is an entrepreneur and creative woman. For a long time she has wanted to be independent and have her own business selling crafts at the park of the town Bello.

Now she can make her dream come true thanks to her great capacity at work, the support she is getting from Interactuar Corporation and the people that want to see her and her business succeed.

Her husband and son will depend on this business. They are her greatest motivation. 

She is requesting this financial support to buy different crafts in bulk and shelves to put in her business. This loan will allow her to dream about a better future.

loans.use: to buy different crafts in bulk and shelves to put in her business.
